title: Modern House v2
briefDescription: Hello how are you, today I bring you my second creation, MODERN HOUSE V2. I uploaded one recently, you can download it too !. This house ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello how are you, today I bring you my second creation, MODERN HOUSE V2. I uploaded one recently, you can download it too !.
This house is simple and minimalist, last 1 day in just building it, the house has a room with 2 beds, kitchen, dining room and living room. It is two floors and outside it has a pool with several umbrellas to protect you from the sun, you will not be alone because the mods also enjoy a stay in the pool.
The pool has approx. 3 blocks deep and a ladder to get out. Near the house is a river with fascinating aquatic animals such as turtles, octopuses and dolphins.
It has a small dock with 8 boats so you can ride on the river and explore new places.
New creations coming soon.

title: Modern House
briefDescription: Hello how are you, this is a two-story Modern house to play alone or with friends and have fun. It has 1 room with 4 beds, living ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello how are you, this is a two-story Modern house to play alone or with friends and have fun. It has 1 room with 4 beds, living room, kitchen and library. I hope you like it :D. more creations COMING SOON.
This house has a simple, modern and minimalist design, ideal to play and even record great minecraft adventures in it, last 1 and a half days to make and decorate it, it has a simple decoration and has what it takes to play well.
Outside the house there are some small crops to survive. there are 4. potatoes, beets, carrots and wheat.
right next to the crops it has a small pool of approximately 3 blocks deep and stairs to get out. THE BEST! It has a spacious patio where you can add more crops, a pool or horses and thus protect them from dangerous zombies and other monsters.
On the second floor there is a balcony where you can see the wonderful view of the sea and the little boy laughed in front of the house.

title: Legend of Zelda Wind Waker ? Windfall Island
briefDescription: This map was created in one week. It does not contain NPCs.A map based on the location from The Legend of Zelda Wind Waker ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map was created in one week. It does not contain NPCs.
A map based on the location from The Legend of Zelda Wind Waker called Windfall Island. It has a lighthouse including a windmill and a prison, as well as a item shop.
You can download the map, if you like.
This map is mainly for fun, Once downloaded you are able to add, build and create more for your own individual ideas and adventures.
If you have some feedback or questions, please let me know.
Enjoy and have fun!
This map was created in one week. It is a location from The Legend of Zelda Wind Waker called Windfall Island. You can download it, if you like. This map is mainly for fun, Once downloaded you are able to add, build and create more for your own individual ideas and adventures. Enjoy and have fun!

title: PirateGames 2.0
briefDescription: PirateGames is mix of some minigames built on commands. Minigames are in Pirate and Ships thematic and have cool features that aren't in real game. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
PirateGames is mix of some minigames built on commands. Minigames are in Pirate and Ships thematic and have cool features that aren?t in real game. Minigames are for multiplay and for single play. Can play from 1 or 2 players (1-8) (2-8)
Minigames and How to play:
Here are 6 minigames:
Pirate Raid-First minigame that you can play now. Player or players (1-3) most protect island and themselves from pirates. Raid have 9 waves, every wave is harder than was. On 9th wave spawn boss!!! Also vindicators have swords not axes for more realistic.
1 Wave-Vindicator and Pillagers
2 Wave-Vindicator and Pillages
3 Wave-Vindicator and Pillagers
4 Wave-Vindicator, Pillager (Pillagers now stay on ship)
5 Wave-Vindicator, Pillager, Illager, Vex
6 Wave-Drowned,Guardian
7 Wave-Vindicator, Pillager, Illager (Now vindicators can jump from ships on island)
8 Wave-Vindicator, Pillager (they swim faster)
9 Wave-Boss Ravager (effects:resistance,strength,speed) (will change soon)

Big Operation? This minigame is for multiplay (3-8 but can played in 2) Here are 2 roles Thief and Captain. Map choose random player as Captain!!! Thief should steal gold from captain?s ship (gold are stolen writes in scoreboard) 30 gold is win!!! Captain should protect gold, for protection he has diamond armor and some good effects (Resistance,Strength) but he is slow. Captain win when Thief band can?t steal gold for 2 minutes.
Captain become chances: (it changes from players count)
2 player-50%
3 player-33%
4 player-25%
5 player-20%
6 player-16%
7 player-14%
8 player-13%

= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
Shipwreck-Run and jump faster than you can and get out of old pirate ship!!!
PirateWars-Players (from 2) should battle in PVP with crossbows!!! Here are 8 islands and one big central, where are loot chests with random loot in every game
Island raiders-Here are two teams-Creepers and endermans. Every team have block, with this block you can get island (system can be changed) Control center beacose enemy can it get. Team, whose block is on center for many times win!!!
Crazy Ocean-This is demo game and will be updated. Here player or players must survive 3 days in ocean. But it is not that easy! With new Random system here sometimes with random is happening things (good and bad) (sometimes you can have very lucky game, sometimes no) there can happen: Fish Rain, Monster spawning, turtles spawning, unlucky ocean with thunder and pirates invention!!
Creators:
Command blocks-AchuTras217
Map tester: Eleven11sr, MatBer, Mr_David
Ideas: Miriani22, MetBer
Builder: Eleven11sr
Also you can write in comments ideas for minigame for adding in next updates.
(good ideas we will make in next updates and your nickname will be in creators)
PLS don?t copy map, ideas and screens!!!
Lobby and Photos:
This is new 2.0 lobby
This is minigames choosing lobby 2.0

title: Spa Castle MCPE/Oak Village Condos
briefDescription: This is the same map as the last one I made, the only difference is that I decided to create condos around this place. If ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is the same map as the last one I made, the only difference is that I decided to create condos around this place. If you?d like to settle anywhere else than Spa Castle, you can find yourself a place in one of the surrounding condos I built in this map. In addition, I built a market and a schoolhouse for you to enjoy as well.
Welcome to Spa Castle MCPE/Oak Village Condominiums, where I?ve also built garden style apartments for you or your friends to live in. The map wasn?t easy to make, because as you can see, it?s very detailed, and one of the most challenging maps ever made.
Made with 1 player, 0 help or requests.
General view.
Spa Castle itself.
Always of course, when you first start in this world, you?ll spawn in the starter shaft.
World layout map. (Image also available in the Google Drive File)
Oak Village Condos (signs posted outside on Oak Village Lane, and Loggers Avenue)
Park Ridge Condos (Based off of), located in Bayside, NY.
Community Pool.
Outside of the Management Office. (Trucks not included).
Aerial view of Oak Village Lane. (Cars not included).
The roundabout on Oak Village Lane.

Community Ferris Wheel.
Sorry that I didn?t build the gym, I was in a hurry, but it will come in the next update.
Construction overview.
Constructing Oak Village Lane, March 18, 2020, 9:38 PM.
Future spot for community pool. March 18,2020, 6:36 PM.

Future spot for parking lot. March 18, 2020. 9:39 PM.
Finishing construction.
Completion of Oak Village Lane and the roundabout. March 20, 2020. 4:28 PM.

Final construction. March 26, 2020. 2:40AM.
The parking lots were finished on March 27, 2020.
the Ferris wheel was built on March 27, 2020.
Fixed errors (And updates) to Spa Castle.
The hole in between the door and the wall.

After.

Apartment types (Oak Village Condos)
Unit A.
2 beds, 2.5 baths.
Examples.

Floor plan.
Level 1: Entrance, living room, dining room, kitchen, half bathroom.
Level 2: 2 bedrooms with closet and individual bathrooms, stairwell to attic.
Has finished attic
Unit B.
3 beds, 2.5 baths.
Examples.

Floor plan.
Level 1: Entrance, Living room, Den/Dining Room, Kitchen, full bathroom, 2 closets.
Level 2: 2 bedrooms with closets, 1 full bathroom, master bathroom with closet and half bathroom, stairway to attic.
Has finished attic.
some units have balcony/terrace.
Unit C.
3 beds, 2.5 baths. (Same as unit B, but larger size).

Floor plan.
Level 1: Entrance, living room, den/dining room, kitchen, full bathroom.
Level 2: 2 bedrooms with closet, 1 full bath, master bedroom with closet and half bathroom, stairway to attic.
Has finished attic.
Some units have balcony/terrace.
Finished basement (One unit only; 99-32 Spa Castle Street, across from the schoolhouse).
Unit D (Duplex)
4 beds, 3 baths.
(With one mailbox only)

(Note that 98-67 is not a duplex, but 98-65 is)
Floor Plan.
Level 1: Entrance foyer, Living room, Kitchen and dining room combination, 1 bedroom, full bathroom.
Level 2: 2 bedrooms with closet, 1 full bathroom, master bedroom with closet and full bathroom, stairway to attic can vary.
Has Finished attic.
Unit D1
3 beds, 2 bath.
Examples

(Implies Unit D2 as well)
Level 1: Entrance foyer, living room, Kitchen/dining room, 2 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom.
Level 2: Master bedroom with closet and full bathroom.
May have or not have attic, no balcony.
Unit B (or A, but not to be confused with Unit A, the apartment type)
1 bed, 1 bath.
Floor plan, with Interior. (Example, 99-03A Oak Village Lane Unit 2)

Level 2:
Living room
Kitchen.
Kitchen (2)
Bedroom with closet.

Some units have balcony/terrace.

(Same as D, but both levels have full size)
Level 1: 1 or 2 beds, 1 bath.
Level 2: 2 beds, 2 bath.
Examples

98-69 thru 98-77.
Floor plan (split between two separate units)
Level 1: Entrance foyer, Living room, kitchen/Dining or bedroom, master bedroom, 1 full bath.
Level 2 (another unit): Living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms with closets, 2 full size bathrooms, stairwell to attic.
Has finished attic.
Only second floor has attic and balcony.
Market
Outdoor view.
Rear view with parking lot.

Interior view. Note I didn?t stack anything up since I was in a hurry, but will come in the next update.
Ponyville Schoolhouse

The schoolhouse is based off from my favorite TV show of all time; My Little Pony.
Built on March 27, 2020.
More to build
You?ll see these signs at the end of each roads. This indicates that in the Village Town Update (which is coming up next), there will be more to see. Or you can build your own town or city out there.
Village Town Update (Coming soon)

The village Town Update will include new locations and places around this map. The following will be included.
Construction will start slowly, because after working on this map for almost a whole month, I?m going to take a break from building.
License Terms
This map (and its addons) are Exclusive for MCPEDL only. No secondary distributions are allowed, including uploads to other websites or apps that aren?t MCPEDL.
The followings of this map are not allowed.
Thank you for reading, enjoy.

This is what happened after testing the mcworld file.
New Updates!
Market

Revised classroom.
Added school rules.
Detailed teachers desk with name. (This name may sound familiar if you?ve watched My Little Pony FIM).

Revised exterior.
Oak Village Condominiums.
Entrance sign (on the right side).

Entrance sign to Ferris wheel and the 2 new units.
Added three new apartments.

title: Pokemon Gold World Map
briefDescription: Pokemon gold world map in Minecraft Recreated in Minecraft, here I have made the entirety of johto and kanto from pokemon in Minecraft from every ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Pokemon gold world map in Minecraft Recreated in Minecraft, here I have made the entirety of johto and kanto from pokemon in Minecraft from every place and building, you are free to do whatever you want in this world.
The Pokemon brand is owned by the Pok?mon company. I do not have any rights to it.
A map based on Pok?mon gold. Starting from your house, go downstairs and step on the pressure plate downstairs, you are free to explore the world of Pok?mon gold in Minecraft. Travel to memorable places, like Mt. Silver, Goldenrod Store, and SS Aqua. Or travel to Kanto and explore things like saffron city, celadon hotel, and many more!
you can do whatever you want in this map, exploring, roleplaying, destroying, play minigames like hide and seek and another fun thing you can do
You can fly between locations on the map. The pressure plates you see can be used to go inside places or on sandstone. Signs will tell you where they will take you. ( for the smaller house who don?t have a pressure plate but do have a door you need to just walk right in)
To travel between Kanto and Johto, you can use the train located in Saffron City (Kanto) and Goldrod City (Johto). Roughly located at the top left of the city Or you can travel with the SS Aqua, which travels between Vermillion City (Kanto) and Olivine (Johto)?roughly located at the bottom of the cities.
This map does not contain any Pok?mon or other NPCs. It?s only the map of Pok?mon Gold.
Recommended settings: max render distance of 24 and a simulation distance of 4.
If you discover any errors, or have some feedback or questions, let me know in the comments. Please
Describe the error as best as possible. Preferably with coordinates.
Introduction Video
Cerulean city
Whirl islands
Pok? mart

title: 7 Segment Display Driver!
briefDescription: This is a follow up world of my display that i made using binary coded decimal, this has all the drivers and such so have ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a follow up world of my display that i made using binary coded decimal, this has all the drivers and such so have fun! all you have to do is put in your numbers in binary and it should come up correctly on the display!
Here is my youtube video!
So just put in the binary and it should come up with your decimal number
This display drive is much more efficient and compact than making a rom display drive.

title: Forest Roam Manor
briefDescription: Forest Roam Manor is one of the biggest mansions on the block! It consists of 4 bedrooms in total including the master bedroom. It's a big ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Forest Roam Manor is one of the biggest mansions on the block! It consists of 4 bedrooms in total including the master bedroom. It?s a big open-space mansion with plenty of activities for your enjoyment. The mansion is surrounded by wood as it?s in the setting of a rural forest area. The mansion is the best and one of the most expensive mansions on the market as it sells for a minimum of $1,500,000.
Forest Roam Manor has over 10 rooms where you can have fun and enjoy your stay in a mansion that sells for over $1.5 million on the market!
This map initially included the ESBE shaders pack and the Flows HD texture pack to better your experience and gameplay! *But you would have to download them (link featured below) and apply them to the world yourself!*
Rooms
-Kitchen
-2 bathrooms
-Living Room
-Storage Room
-Craft Room
-Gaming Room
-Bolling Alley
-Master Bedroom
-3 guest bedrooms
-Foyer
While there may be a stacked and fulfilled interior for the benefit of your enjoyment in your Forest Roam Manor stay. There?s also a nice exterior and backyard.
Backyard
-Water Fountain
-Swimming Pool
-Small Garden
-Big Open Yard
-Mini Soccer Field
There?s much fun entertainment outside for all of your guests for any party you may have. You could choose threw all 5 of the entertainment activities in your own backyard. The backyard is also surrounded and fenced by many tall spruce trees.
The house design is a pretty standard wooden home. The house is made out of all sorts of wood and stones. The house is the shape of a rectangle with some round edges. The house consists of som skylights on top of the roof. Some windows are over the walls of the house, but the house is mostly private for its residents. The mansion is 1 floor, but the space inside the house is very big.
*Future Update- Possible basement: Movie Theater, Basketball court and etc!*
*Shout out to the ESBE shaders pack and the Flows HD texture Pack!*

This map showcases the features that are coming to the Nether Update, from New mobs such as Hoglins, and Piglins, from New Blocks such as Basalt, Warped and Crimson Logs to New Biomes such as the Soul Sand Valley, The Nether Wastes and more!

title: Redstone Calculator!
briefDescription: This is a small 4 bit redstone calculator, built so you can see how logic gates and parts of the circuit are built. Using this knowledge ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a small 4 bit redstone calculator, built so you can see how logic gates and parts of the circuit are built. Using this knowledge you can go out and build your own calculators with designs like this.
The calculator can do up to 10 + 10
This is a 4 bit redstone calculator demonstrating the usage of logic gates to add binary numbers.
Features are:
8 bit number storage
7 segment display with driver
easy to use input panel
colour coded parts

title: Neuschwabenland

crawledImageUrls.text:
Neuschwabenland, from narrow streets to large fortresses and isolated villages.
Fields that are endless and forests with ruins. From Gloria to decline.
The empire, it lives ? And that forever to the end!
Neuschwabenland is a medieval city, which has several smaller villages and towns in the area of influence. They are spread around the capital of its fields. Each city has its own flag and houses.
Hope you like my city ?

title: Pink Mansion
briefDescription: Welcome to Pink Mansion! This modern house is almost entirely pink and includes amenities such as a large backyard pool and hot tub, outdoor kitchen, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Pink Mansion! This modern house is almost entirely pink and includes amenities such as a large backyard pool and hot tub, outdoor kitchen, a secret entrance to an underground bunker, and more!
Welcome to Pink Mansion, a futuristic-modern house built by me, claire1593. Amenities include a large backyard pool and hot tub, outdoor kitchen, a secret entrance to an underground bunker, and more! This project was really fun to plan out and build. I hope you . all enjoy it!
This mansion was originally built for an Instagram follower of mine, but as soon as I started really working on it, I knew that I wanted to share it with all of you.

title: Paranormal Game (World)
briefDescription: This world is based off of the IndieDB Game of the same name by MattCohen, this is just a recreation of Mattel Clark?s house ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This world is based off of the IndieDB Game of the same name by MattCohen, this is just a recreation of Mattel Clark?s house from the IndieDB game ?Paranormal? in Minecraft, this took a 2 days to make, hope you guys like it. (best played with friends)
This is made for all those people who have heard or have played the original closed beta of the Paranormal game by MattCohen completely remade in Minecraft, it has everything from the basement to the attic, the world is set in adventure mode so no blocks or entities are destroyed by accident, this map includes the living room, the attic, the kitchen, the bedroom, the garage, the basement, the bathroom, and the backyard. This map took 2 days to make and is meant for roleplaying purposes, so its best to have the music off and is best to be played with friends and other players, hope you all enjoy the map.
